title: Samsung reveals Galaxy A23 and LTE-only Galaxy A13 variant
content:
Samsung just released the Galaxy S22 and Tab S8 series last month, but the company still has plenty of phones left to reveal this year. The Galaxy A13 5G arrived in the United States in January, and now a cheaper LTE-only version of that phone is on its way to more countries. Samsung has also

The post Samsung reveals Galaxy A23 and LTE-only Galaxy A13 variant appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung released the Galaxy A13 5G earlier this year, but now an LTE-only version is on the way too. The Galaxy A23 was also announced.
